label: logicB:marketing_en
steps: [1] If we increase ad spend on high-intent keywords, click-throughs rise.
[2] If click-throughs rise, landing page visits increase.
[3] For every customer segment x, if we deliver a personalized offer to x, then x's conversion rate improves.
[4] If landing page visits increase and segment a's conversion rate improves, total conversions increase.
[5] We increased ad spend on high-intent keywords.
[6] We delivered a personalized offer to segment a.
[7] Landing page visits increased and segment a's conversion rate improved. (from [1â€“3], [5], [6])
